data.lyric:
[ti:Championships (Explicit)]
[ar:Meek Mill]
[al:Championships (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Championships (Explicit) - Meek Mill
[00:10.83]Yeah uh
[00:12.37]All the young'uns in my hood popping percs now
[00:14.89]Gettin' high to get by it's gettin' worse now
[00:18.03]You gotta tell 'em put them guns and them percs down
[00:20.31]Them new jails got ten yards in 'em and that's your first down uh
[00:24.24]And I ain't come here to preach
[00:25.94]I just had to say somethin' 'cause I'm the one with the reach
[00:28.77]Youngin' gotta quarter ounce he tryna turn into Meech
[00:31.41]Ain't had no daddy he's had to learn from the streets
[00:33.62]I used to be a honor roll student d**n
[00:36.06]Then I turned to a beast
[00:37.28]The first time I seen a n***a get some blood on his sneaks
[00:39.72]He had on Air Max 93s but was slumped in the street
[00:43.01]His mama cryin' that did somethin' to me oh Lord
[00:45.41]The s**t I'm doin' for my hood I won't get an award
[00:48.64]I used to sell Reggie d**n how I get to the Forbes
[00:51.56]I take a shot if I miss I'm gettin' them boards
[00:54.41]Ain't quittin' no more like give me some more
[00:57.22]We wearing Old Navy it felt like Christian Dior
[01:00.14]Was dead broke but rich in soul was we really that poor
[01:03.08]Was we really that dumb 'Cause we carry a gun
[01:05.77]And every n***a in my neighborhood carryin' one
[01:08.65]'Cause we had nightmares of our mamas gotta bury her son
[01:11.55]I'm speakin' to you as a prophet as rare as they come uh
[01:15.33]Gunshots sound like music hangin' out the Buick
[01:17.94]Why you wanna be a shooter
[01:19.46]Mama told me not to do it but I did it
[01:21.66]Now I'm locked up in a prison
[01:23.11]Callin' mama like I shouldn't have did it
[01:24.77]Watch my dream shatter in an instant
[01:26.68]I'm on a visit posin' for the picture
[01:28.80]Like I'm going for my prom or somethin'
[01:30.72]Like I ain't facing time or somethin'
[01:32.47]Ridin' for these n***as like that s**t ain't hurt my mom or somethin'
[01:35.10]Only one gon' get me commissary or even buy me somethin'
[01:37.80]When it all fall down
[01:39.25]I can't call y'all now
[01:40.53]Even if I hit your phone
[01:41.93]That won't get me home
[01:43.44]Seen so many different times these n***as did me wrong
[01:46.17]S**t that's the reason that I did this song
[01:49.69]S**t we was kids used to play on the step
[01:52.12]A couple years later we flirtin' with the angel of death
[01:54.75]I was eleven years old I got my hands on the TEC
[01:57.72]When I first touched it that s**t gave me a rush
[01:59.77]My homie's dying I'm like Maybe we next
[02:02.23]That just made me a threat
[02:03.50]Knowin' the n***as smoke my daddy it just made me upset
[02:06.21]Made me a man s**t I was five when God gave me my test
[02:09.09]Go to court with a court appointed and he won't say he objects
[02:11.99]Now it's you against the state and you ain't got no cake
[02:14.84]Jail overpopulated they ain't got no space
[02:17.76]I know a young'un that got murked ain't get to drive no Wraith
[02:20.65]But he in the hearse on the way to church
[02:22.33]I know his mom gon' faint
[02:23.63]When she smell like embalment fluid cologne all on her baby
[02:26.80]Pastor said he sendin' you home she goin' crazy
[02:29.55]When they drop that casket all in the ground who gon' save me
[02:32.49]How could you blame me
[02:33.94]When I'm tryna stay alive and just survive and beat them odds
[02:36.52]When n***as die by twenty-five
[02:37.99]When I stop fearin' for my life
[02:39.31]When I decide to change my mind
[02:40.82]And stop totin'
[02:41.98]Tryna smoke the pain away they lock us up for smoking
[02:44.73]Put 'em on probation lock 'em up if you ain't perfect
[02:47.67]Victim to the system like a rain drop in the ocean
[02:50.47]They closin' all the schools and all the prisons gettin' open
[02:53.42]Yeah
[02:54.87]See comin' from where I come from
[02:56.66]We had to beat the streets
[02:58.46]Beat the system beat racism beat poverty
[03:02.05]And now we made it through all that we at the championship
